verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w happened|strong="H7122"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Belial, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* Seba, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bochri, \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jemini: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w sounded|strong="H8628"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H8033"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* part \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Isai: return \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thy dwellings, \w O|strong="H8034"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* departed \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* Seba \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bochri: \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda \w stuck|strong="H1692"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w left|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* ward, allowing \w them|strong="H0413"\w* provisions: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* shut \w up|strong="H5704"\w* unto \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w living|strong="H2424"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w widowhood|strong="H0491"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w*: Assemble \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* thou \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w present|strong="H5975"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* went \w to|strong="H3063"\w* \w assemble|strong="H3259"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* men \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Juda, \w but|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* tarried \w beyond|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w set|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H4150"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* king \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Abisai: \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* Seba \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bochri do \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* harm \w than|strong="H4480"\w* did \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*: \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thou \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* fenced \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w escape|strong="H5337"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w Joab’s|strong="H3097"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Cerethi \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Phelethi: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* Seba \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bochri.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Gabaon, \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* met \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w close|strong="H5973"\w* coat \w of|strong="H6440"\w* equal length \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* habit, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* hanging \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* flank, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* scabbard, \w made|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w such|strong="H0834"\w* manner \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* least motion \w and|strong="H0935"\w* strike.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w*: \w God|strong="H0559"\w* save thee, \w my|strong="H3027"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w took|strong="H0270"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* chin \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* kiss \w him|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H8104"\w* notice \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w side|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* gave \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w second|strong="H8138"\w* wound, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abisai \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* Seba \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bochri.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* mean time \w some|strong="H0376"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Joab’s|strong="H3097"\w* company stopping \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* dead body \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Amasa, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Behold \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Joab’s|strong="H3097"\w* stead \w the|strong="H0559"\w* companion \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* imbrued \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w lay|strong="H1556"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w*. \w A|strong="H3588"\w* \w certain|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w still|strong="H5975"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w removed|strong="H5437"\w* \w Amasa|strong="H6021"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w highway|strong="H4546"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* covered \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* passed \w might|strong="H1818"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w stop|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w removed|strong="H4480"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0376"\w* \w went|strong="H0376"\w* \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w following|strong="H0310"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* Seba \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bochri.

\w Now|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto Abela \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Bethmaacha: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* chosen \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* gathered together unto \w him|strong="H0310"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* besieged \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Abela, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Bethmaacha, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w works|strong="H5550"\w* round \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* besieged: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, laboured \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w throw|strong="H8210"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*: \w Come|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* hither, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H0802"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H0802"\w* \w was|strong="H0802"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Art thou \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*? \w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w he|strong="H0802"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w*. \w And|strong="H0802"\w* she \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* \w thus|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* thy \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*. \w He|strong="H0802"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w do|strong="H0589"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1696"\w* \w she|strong="H3651"\w* \w again|strong="H1696"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w A|strong="H1696"\w* \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* \w was|strong="H7592"\w* used \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w old|strong="H7223"\w* proverb: \w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w inquire|strong="H7592"\w*, \w let|strong="H3651"\w* \w them|strong="H7592"\w* \w inquire|strong="H7592"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* Abela: \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w an|strong="H0559"\w* \w end|strong="H8552"\w*.

\w Am|strong="H0595"\w* not \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w she|strong="H0517"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* answer truth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou seekest \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w destroy|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* overthrow \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* wilt thou throw down \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*?
